attributes.action: make it illegal for bank's & credit/store card companies to put there fee's through our account's when there is no fund to cover it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: let's stop bank's & credit/store card companies from putting there fee's through our account's when there is no fund's to cover it just so that they can charge us more money for going over our limit's. just because there charge's put us there

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
